items.title: Element: Risk identification, classification and assessment
items.description: Organizations protect their ability to perform their mission by systematically identifying, prioritizing and analyzing potential security threats, vulnerabilities, and consequences using accepted methodologies. The first set of requirements present the actions an organization takes to carry out both a high-level and detailed risk assessment that incorporates vulnerability assessment, in a typical chronological order. Among these requirements, those related to preparing for high-level and detailed risk assessments are 4.2.3.1, 4.2.3.2 and 4.2.3.8 below. The last few requirements (4.2.3.10 to 4.2.3.14) are general requirements that apply to the overall risk assessment process. Subclause 4.3.4.2 covers the process of taking action based upon this assessment.

Description:
Organizations protect their ability to perform their mission by systematically identifying,

vulnerability assessment, in a typical chronological order. Among these requirements, those

items.text: The organization shall select a particular risk assessment and
analysis approach and methodology that identifies and prioritizes
risks based upon security threats, vulnerabilities and consequences
related to their IACS assets.

items.title: Conduct a high-level risk assessment

items.text: A high-level system risk assessment shall be performed to
understand the financial and HSE consequences in the event that
availability, integrity or confidentiality of the IACS is compromised.

items.title: Identify the IACS

items.text: The organization shall identify the various IACS, gather data about
the devices to characterize the nature of the security risk and group
the devices into logical systems.

items.text: The organization shall develop simple network diagrams for each of
the logically integrated systems showing the major devices, network
types and general locations of the equipment.

items.requirement: The organization shall develop simple network diagrams for each of the logically integrated systems showing the major devices, network types and general locations of the equipment.

items.text: The organization shall develop the criteria and assign a priority

items.text: The organization shall perform a detailed vulnerability assessment
of its individual logical IACS, which may be scoped based on the

to these risks.

items.requirement: The organization shall perform a detailed vulnerability assessment of its individual logical IACS, which may be scoped based on the high-level risk assessment results and prioritization of IACS subject to these risks.

items.text: The organization’s risk assessment methodology shall include
methods for prioritizing detailed vulnerabilities identified in the
detailed vulnerability assessment.

items.requirement: The organization’s risk assessment methodology shall include methods for prioritizing detailed vulnerabilities identified in the detailed vulnerability assessment.

items.title: Conduct a detailed risk assessment

items.text: The organization shall conduct a detailed risk assessment
incorporating the vulnerabilities identified in the detailed
vulnerability assessment.

items.requirement: The organization shall conduct a detailed risk assessment incorporating the vulnerabilities identified in the detailed vulnerability assessment.

items.title: Identify the reassessment frequency and triggering criteria

items.text: The organization shall identify the risk and vulnerability
reassessment frequency as well as any reassessment triggering
criteria based on technology, organization, or industrial operation
changes.

items.requirement: The organization shall identify the risk and vulnerability reassessment frequency as well as any reassessment triggering criteria based on technology, organization, or industrial operation changes.

items.title: Integrate physical, HSE and cyber security risk assessment results

items.text: The results of physical, HSE and cyber security risk assessments
shall be integrated to understand the assets’ overall risk.

items.requirement: The results of physical, HSE and cyber security risk assessments shall be integrated to understand the assets’ overall risk.

items.title: Conduct risk assessments throughout the lifecycle of the IACS

items.text: Risk assessments shall be conducted through all stages of the
technology lifecycle including development, implementation,
changes and retirement.

items.requirement: Risk assessments shall be conducted through all stages of the technology lifecycle including development, implementation, changes and retirement.

items.text: The risk assessment methodology and the results of the risk
assessment shall be documented.

items.requirement: The risk assessment methodology and the results of the risk assessment shall be documented.

items.text: Up-to-date vulnerability assessment records should be maintained
for all assets comprising the IACS.
